title: Patriots stock watch: Here’s who stood out and struggled in lopsided win against Browns

title: 8 takeaways from Patriots’ blowout win over Browns
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots Despite facing plenty of pressure from Myles Garrett, Drake Maye still threw for 3 touchdowns against Cleveland.
Jaylinn Hawkins and the Patriots had plenty of reasons to celebrate on Sunday.

(AP Photo/Charles Krupa) By Conor Ryan October 26, 2025 | 11:10 AM 11 minutes to read FOXBOROUGH — The Patriots’ win streak extended to five games on Sunday via a 32-13 victory over the Cleveland Browns at Gillette Stadium.

title: Morgan Geekie: ‘My dad would be proud’ of last-second goal against Avs

title: Former Patriots RB urges fans not to panic about TreVeyon Henderson’s playing time, productivity
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots "I don't think it's necessarily a trust issue.
" TreVeyon Henderson only had two carries in the Patriots' win over the Titans in Week 7.
(AP Photo/John Amis) After dazzling in training camp and the preseason, TreVeyon Henderson hasn’t lived up to expectations so far in his rookie season as his playing time has fluctuated.

title: Insider lists Red Sox as fits for 5 top pitchers who could get traded this offseason
author: Conor Roche
bullets: Boston Red Sox After landing Garrett Crochet in a trade last offseason, the Red Sox still have one of the stronger farm systems in baseball to possibly make a deal for a top pitcher.
Tarik Skubal has been rumored to possibly get traded this offseason.

(AP Photo/Lindsey Wasson) It’s evident that the Red Sox need some help at the top of their rotation, which is part of the reason why one insider believes they’ll be in the mix for some of the top pitchers who might be available this offseason.

title: From opening tip with ‘Roundball Rock’ on, NBA return to NBC off to a good start
